articles.title: Crypto market’s weekly winners and losers – NOT, MANTRA, FTM, PENDLE - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Here is how some of your favorite assets concluded the week.
articles.content:
• MANTRA, MultiversX, and Notcoin were the biggest winners last week.
  • ORDI, Pendle, and Fantom ended the past week as the biggest losers.
Mantra has dominated the gainers chart… [+5531 chars]
